org.raxa.scheduler

Class OutgoingCallManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raxa.scheduler.OutgoingCallManager

  • public class OutgoingCallManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Call Patient Number and set context to handle the call via AGI
    Author:
    atul

      java.lang.String getTTSNotation(java.lang.String preferLanguage)
      here if TTS does not support the prefer Language,It will pass English as defaultLanguage.But then the header and footer should be played in default language if the mode is AudioFolder.all language should be in lower case in prop file.

      • callPatient

        public boolean callPatient(java.lang.String pnumber,
                  java.lang.String msgId,
                  java.lang.String aid,
                  java.lang.String preferLanguage)
        Tell Asterisk to call a number:pnumber and give control of the call to "CONTEXT:EXTENSION". Set channel variables which is passed to AGI in extensions.conf
        Parameters:
        pnumber -
        msgId -
        aid -
        preferLanguage -
        Returns:

      • getTTSNotation

        public java.lang.String getTTSNotation(java.lang.String preferLanguage)
        here if TTS does not support the prefer Language,It will pass English as defaultLanguage.But then the header and footer should be played in default language if the mode is AudioFolder.all language should be in lower case in prop file.
        Parameters:
        preferLangaue:Language - that need to converted to voice by TTS.
        Returns:
        short notation of the Langauge understood by the TTS.
